SUBSCRIPTIONBOX_SEARCH_WHERE.Statement: WHERE (@subscription_box_course_id_like_escaped IS NULL OR @subscription_box_course_id_like_escaped = '' OR w2_SubscriptionBox.subscription_box_course_id LIKE @subscription_box_course_id_like_escaped +'%' ESCAPE '#') AND (@sbcn_like_escaped IS NULL OR @sbcn_like_escaped = '' OR w2_SubscriptionBox.management_name LIKE @sbcn_like_escaped +'%' ESCAPE '#' OR w2_SubscriptionBox.display_name LIKE @sbcn_like_escaped +'%' ESCAPE '#') AND (@valid_flg IS NULL OR @valid_flg = '' OR @valid_flg = w2_SubscriptionBox.valid_flg) AND (@product_id_like_escaped IS NULL OR @product_id_like_escaped ='' OR w2_SubscriptionBoxItem.product_id LIKE @product_id_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#')
